remarks: A property ` ch ` holding for a representative of a single-valued class expression ` C ( y ) ` (see e.g. ~ reusv2 ) also holds for its description binder ` D ` (in the form of property ` th ` ). (Contributed by NM, 5-Mar-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2016.)
statement:
riotasv3d.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
riotasv3d.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y th ) $.
riotasv3d.3 $e |- ( ph -> D = ( iota_ x e. A A. y e. B ( ps -> x = C ) ) ) $.
riotasv3d.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ C = D ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
riotasv3d.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( y e. B /\ ps ) -> ch ) ) $.
riotasv3d.6 $e |- ( ph -> D e. A ) $.
riotasv3d.7 $e |- ( ph -> E. y e. B ps ) $.
riotasv3d $p |- ( ( ph /\ A e. V ) -> th ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ps x $.
